Appendix 16
RJ.&.E
o ©
PUBLICATIONS
AND
RECORDINGS
Herewith a listing of the major publications and records which
the National Association of Educational Broadcasters has avail¬
able for distribution to the membership and the general public.
Order blanks are included. Any of the materials listed may be
ordered from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
14 Gregory Hall, Urbana, Illinois.
(REVISED EDITION. DISCARD ALL PREVIOUS LISTS* PRICES
INDICATED IN PREVIOUS LISTS NO LONGER APPLICABLE.)
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Revised, February, 1959
